channel.title: Conda on Daozhang
channel.description: Recent content in Conda on Daozhang

item.title: conda
item.description: conda 1.创建环境 conda create -n name [dependent package list] 例如 conda create -n pyyabc python=3.6 2.激活失效环境 source activate name source deactivate 3.列出环境 conda info --envs 带*为当前环境 4.删除环境 conda remove -n name --all
